about.idesign: I design user interfaces and develop custom software. I program more than just responsive websites and mobile applications. I find and build digital solutions.
about.coder: Development of complex, dynamic and scalable sites with Html, CSS, SASS, JS and React framework. Backend development with Nodejs, Npm, Express, Websockets, MongoDB, Mongoose, etc.
about.courseit: Website creation with html, css, JS and React. Using git and github in collaborative projects.
about.jst-description: Development and maintenance of the organization's records management system. Localization of the government platform. Application development with Flutter.
about.dev-sdch-: Creation and development of a PWA (Design and coding of both frontend and backend). Flight management system, including bookings, payments to pilots and instructors, user accounts in pesos and dollars, jump counts for users, equipment status tracking. Rentals management. Folding management. Sale of tandem jump tickets, school, courses, etc.
